title: Great Hotel!
text: We enjoyed our stay at Adante Hotel & would stay there again. We were greeted Tony at checkin who was always friendly & helpful at the front desk. Our room was clean & tidy with a huge ensuite, big TV, iron, safe & ceiling fan. The area can feel a bit dodgy at night, but we felt safe going to & from the hotel. The only negative is that the complimentary breakfast isn't very exciting, so we went to 'Dottie's True Blue Cafe' nearby & enjoyed delicious breakfasts there.
